{"id":1190496393,"question_id":3278,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1709286356,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"143 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1190496393/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Ways to Place People I","memory":"32.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool chk(int i, int j, auto & points){\n        int xl = min(points[i][0], points[j][0]), xr = max(points[i][0], points[j][0]);\n        int yl = min(points[i][1], points[j][1]), yr = max(points[i][1], points[j][1]);\n        for(int x = 0; x < points.size(); x++){\n            if(x == i || x == j) continue;\n            int tx = points[x][0], ty = points[x][1];\n            if(xl <= tx && tx <= xr && yl <= ty && ty <= yr) return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    int numberOfPairs(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        int ans = 0, n = points.size();\n        for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){\n            for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++){\n                auto &ta = min(points[i], points[j]), &tb = max(points[i], points[j]);\n                if(i != j && !(ta[0] < tb[0] && ta[1] < tb[1])){\n                    cout << i << ' ' << j << endl;\n                    ans += chk(i, j, points);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-ways-to-place-people-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
